   sphinx-quickstart on Tue May 31 15:51:57 2022.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to IEMAP API's documentation!
=====================================

The IEMAP API is a set of Python modules that provide a unified interface to the IEMAP data, stored into a mongoDB database, hosted in ENEA servers. The API is designed to be used by the IEMAP web application, which is also available on GitHub.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   install
